data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Papum Pare, Arunachal Pradesh, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Papum Pare, Arunachal Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 157,400 souls in Papum Pare and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Papum Pare, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Papum Pare, Arunachal Pradesh, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Aiton people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Aiton people.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 153,759, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Papum Pare, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Papum Pare, Arunachal Pradesh, India has a population of 157,400.

We estimate Papum Pare has 1,731 people who might know Jesus, 1,910 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 153,759 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Papum Pare.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
